ComicInfo.Summary:
Girly-Girl heads a lynch mob in an attempt to kill Ziggie.
Sherill abuses Joel.
Get ugly
Studs sounds off.
The goon makes a robot.
The thoughts of an isolated woman.
Chuckie-Boy is ill.
Various terms for vomiting.
Mom gets a job, leaving the kids to fend for themselves.
Junior is followed home.
The cast go on a picnic.
